feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.37.6
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(cli): add build and publish piece commands, update docs (#6230) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • fix(human-input): files should be sent as form data (#6309) @abuaboud
  • fix(utility-ai): fix empty text error (#6300) @kishanprmr
  • fix(apitable): fix two link field (#6301) @kishanprmr
  • fix(activepieces): remove outdated actions (#6305) @abuaboud
  • feat(gmail): new labeled email trigger (#6299) @abuaboud
  • feat(pylon): custom api call (#6292) @abuaboud
  • test: backend tests (#6289) @abuaboud
  • feat(metabase): allow full question id (#6287) @AdamSelene
  • feat(intercom): add trigger for tagged conversations (#6288) @AdamSelene
  • fix(smtp): retry on connection refused (#6285) @abuaboud
  • feat(wedof) : correction bug actions certification folders (#6254) @obenazouz-wedof
  • feat(google-gemini): migrate to official SDK and prioritize gemini-1.5-flash support (#6256) @abuaboud
  • fix(webhooks): return response redirect should work without protocl (#6255) @abuaboud
  • feat(pipedrive): add filters for updated deal trigger (#6226) @kishanprmr
  • refactor: google sheets (#6240) @abuaboud

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(truncation): allow max log size to be configurable (#6310) @abuaboud
  • fix(sandbox): switch cloudflare to google dns in sandbox (#6308) @abuaboud
  • fix: Stop forcing filling optional oauth2 props when creating connections like MS Dynamics 365 (#6249) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • feat(piece-dialog): improve the error message (#6303) @abuaboud

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: upgrade pnpm to 9.15.0 (#6306) @abuaboud
  • chore: remove completed system jobs (#6263) @abuaboud
  • feat: avoid deep cloning in engine (#6261) @abuaboud
  • chore: Security upgrade nanoid from 3.3.6 to 3.3.8 (#6259) @abuaboud
  • refactor: move all engine operations to workers (#6251) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @mordonez, @obenazouz-wedof, @snyk-bot and @thibclz

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(copilot): move copilot configurations to admin platform (#6372) @aboudzein
  • feat: multi selection for copying, pasting and deleting (#6315) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • fix(google-search-console): fix date range format error (#6357) @kishanprmr
  • feat(harvest): add basic Harvest piece (#6321) @D-Rowe-FS
  • fix(google-sheets): "cannot read properties of null" error when using‚Ä¶ (#6363) @wise-introvert
  • fix(linked-in): update api version (#6356) @abuaboud
  • feat(twin-lab): improved user experience (#6339) @alegria-solutions
  • fix(pipedrive): fix custom fields and test data response (#6334) @kishanprmr
  • feat(microsoft-outlook-calendar): create/delete/list events (#6307) @antonyvigouret
  • fix(google-sheets): "cannot read properties of null" error when using‚Ä¶ (#6290) @wise-introvert
  • fix(slack): add text with with block kits (#6312) @kishanprmr
  • feat(google-sheets): insert the missing headers in JSON mode (#6313) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: remove copilot flag and replace it with platform (#6373) @abuaboud
  • fix: log sso sign ups events (#6369) @abuaboud
  • fix(wedof-piece): fixing api link (#6365) @obenazouz-wedof
  • fix: quota exceeded response & metadata for file (#6367) @abuaboud
  • fix: props validation (#6368) @abuaboud
  • fix: backend tests with mock log (#6364) @abuaboud
  • fix: minor styling fixes (#6362) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: search result should not tort alpha (#6338) @abuaboud
  • fix(forms): validate using same input names (#6317) @abuaboud
  • fix: pieces tables filtering (#6316) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add external id to project settings (#6350) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add D-Rowe-FS as a contributor for plugin (#6341) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: the ability to spin up worker with minimal number of environment variables (#6351) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove type & platform id from worker (#6355) @abuaboud
  • fix(local-dev): make it work for windows (#6336) @abuaboud
  • chore: structured logging (#6319) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @D-Rowe-FS, @aboudzein, @abuaboud, @alegria-solutions, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @antonyvigouret, @kishanprmr, @noullet, @obenazouz-wedof and @wise-introvert

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: history was recording incomplete urls inside the app (#6379) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer and @abuaboud

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.2
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix: date helper format mismatch (#6137) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(customerio): don't send customer identifier as event id (#6391) @AdamSelene
  • feat(microsoft-outlook-calendar): add offline_access to oauth2 scope (#6390) @antonyvigouret
  • fix(qdrant): fix content/payload field for add points action (#6378) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(get-public-ip): resolve issue when Google DNS is blocked (#6401) @amrabuaza
  • fix: allow pasting in empty flows (#6400) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(s3-validation): add s3 conifguration validation (#6395) @amrabuaza

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add ChineseHamberger as a contributor for plugin (#6383) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: Security upgrade node from 18.20.4-bullseye-slim to 18.20.5-bullseye-slim (#6381) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrabuaza, @antonyvigouret, @kishanprmr and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.3
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add time range picker to date filters on tables like runs and audit logs (#6399) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat: add check-file-type action for file-helper (#6375) @ChineseHamberger
  • fix(google-sheets): fix row number response (#6408) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: allow duplicate entries in dictionary inputs (#6410) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: multi selection shortcuts on mac (#6409) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: cancel multi selection when right click is clicked outside the selection box (#6409) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @ChineseHamberger, @abuaboud and @kishanprmr
